overview: Little Big George is a very warm innocent and fun loving film about a little boy named George actually Georgy Porgy who loves to eat, but most importantly loves to cook! His small little brain is a treasure island of recipes waiting to be explored, discovered, cooked and tasted. Georgy's biggest dream is to be a famous chef when he grows up and have his own TV show, Prime-Time! Unfortunately his mum and dad are not very happy about that. Little Big George is the story of this small little food wonder, who even having to face his strict non understanding parents and constantly bullying friends, lives his dream every single moment with the hope and belief that he will achieve it ONE FINE FOODIE DAY!
title: Little Big George
